author.name: Lane doe
author.bio: I’m Lane. I’m 24-year-old. I’m a Digital Product Designer who prioritizes simplicity and usability. Currently, I'm Digital Product Designer on Norma. Formerly Enrich Mobile, ASDC, TalentMondo, and MobileUpp. I love working on side projects, trying to improve myself on SwiftUI and Webflow.
